plot: A drug transaction involving a foreign organization fails. Two foreign guys are sent to solve the situation. A stupid taxi driver takes them to the South Zone of Rio de Janeiro. This mix of personalities ends with a hilarious outcome.
title: Fui!!!
plot_es: A drug transaction involving a foreign organization fails. Two foreign guys are sent to solve the situation. A stupid taxi driver takes them to the South Zone of Rio de Janeiro. This mix of personalities ends with a hilarious outcome.
